txt.en: The statue of Helm has been destroyed
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow Helm's statue to be destroyed</rgb>

Helm Hammerhand's memorial stands upon the Dike at the location where he perished. The Rohirrim draw inspiration and courage from the sight of the statue raised above the trench wall. The enemy cannot be allowed to destroy the statue while the men of Rohan still stand to defend Helm's Dike.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Statue is dealt heavy damage
* Rohirrim guards defeated
Defeat the siege trolls assaulting Helm's monument ([placeholder]/5)
Helm Hammerhand's statue must be defended from the enemies seeking to desecrate his memorial and dishearten the soldiers guarding the dike.
